"Oh, <%me>.<br>Taking a break too? Hehe,: "While my body is completely purified, if I push myself too hard, Philia will get mad at me. So I take breaks every now and then."
"Plus the ARKS Ship has changed so much since our rest, so it's fun just wandering around."

"<%me>.
That person just now, I think he's the representative of the Summoner class, Pietro. Right?"

"Ugh.
Oh my friend and their partner. Are the Guardians on break?"

"Eh, ehhh?! partner..!?
I sometimes think that it would be nice,
but when you put it that way..!"

"Eh, ehhh?! partner..!?
I know that between girls, it's used as friends,
but when you say it like that..!"
"Partners, what a wonderful thing. Be it friend or children, I believe you should always have them close."
"Hmm... Hmmmmm."
"1. Something wrong?"
"2. Take care then"
"Ah, my friend, I knew you'd hear me out! Friends are truly what you need in life!"

"Please wait, my friend!
Shouldn't you be asking
\"What Happened?\", as a friend?"
"You see, it just hit me right now. I thought, that my children whom I love, don't actually love me."
"Hold on my friend! Please, no need to say more! I understand! I understand that it's not possible."
"I, cannot be forgiven. I who doubted their love ever so slightly!"
"That's why this loneliness is a punishment to myself. They've understood that as well and haven't looked at me nor tried to hold me back!"
"1. Aren't you just being ignored?"
"2. Don't beat yourself up because of it"

"Shhh!
<%me>! Don't say that!"

"That's right!
What <%me> said!"
"You know, if you're feeling sad, I'm certain your pets feel the same way."
"This was the part where you were supposed to nod in agreement."
"Hey, look!"
"O-oh! E-Elizabeth!?"
"No, no. Keep away! I don't have the right to face all of you! I'm, a terrible person."
"The love you've given me in the form of strikes, smacks and bites!"
"I doubted that love, I briefly thought that \"perhaps I'm being attacked is because I'm disliked?\""
"Even though you cannot speak, you used your bodies to display your love, and I doubted all of it. How awful, I'M A FAILURE OF A SUMMONER"
"N-no, you keep away, Elizabeth! Don't come any closer to me! I'm, I'm..."
"Hey, uhh <%me>? Is it just me, or is Pietro's the one trying to get close..?"
"E-Elizabeth?! That display of love... Are you saying that you will forgive someone like me?"
"ELIZABETH!! Thank you Elizabeth! Thank you! I will never let you down again!"
"Hahaha, Elizabeth! You're feistier than usual. You must have been lonely, right? There, there..there.. Ow, Ow!"
"Now then, let's head on home and have a feast! Today, it will be a feast made with love!"
"Uhhh, I'm not sure how to say this, but..."
"If they haven't left him at all, it probably means Pietro's pets don't think badly of him, right?"
"Oh, hey, no Elizabeth! We'll feast when we get home, and I'm not foo... OW OW OW OW, AHHH OWOWOWOWOW!!"
"...Hopefully."
